page.title: 09LIFE IN A VILLAGE
page.content: As part of the project we did a study of the people who live in the village. Most people go shopping to Grimsby each week to do their shopping.Quite a number of husbands accompany their wives when they do the weekly shopping There is only one shop in the village which serves as a post office as well The shop sells most of the every day needs of the people such as groceries, newspapers,sweets and cigarettes. There is a mobile butchers van which comes around the village once a week. There is also a mobile library van which visits the village weekly. A very long time ago there was a variety of shops in the village but these have long since gone with the greater mobility of the people, many of whom have cars. This year the shop has been robbed twice. Once the safe was stolen The culprits were never found.
